Package StyleSheets

Class Grid.Builder

java.lang.Object
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.RuleSet.Builder<Grid.Builder>
StyleSheets.Grid.Builder
Enclosing class:
Grid
public static class Grid.Builder
extends RuleSet.Builder<Grid.Builder>
The builder class for the grid. It is an inner static class used to build an immutable instance of a Grid object.

  • Field Summary

      public Builder​(java.lang.String selector)

  • Method Details

    • setTemplateAreas

      public Grid.Builder setTemplateAreas​(java.lang.String... areas)
      Sets the grid-template-areas property for the grid. It takes String varargs that specify each area in the grid-layout.
      Parameters:
      areas - the areas which make up the grid-template-areas
      Returns:
      builder of generic type for grids

    • setTemplate

      public Grid.Builder setTemplate​(java.lang.String... values)
      Sets the grid-template which is a shorthand for defining grid columns, rows and areas. It takes String varargs that specify each value for the grid-template.
      Parameters:
      values - the values used in the grid-template
      Returns:
      builder of generic type for grids

    • build

      public Grid build()
      Builds the grid and returns it.
      Overrides:
      build in class RuleSet.Builder<Grid.Builder>
      Returns:
      Grid constructed by the builder
